title: Confirm Amy Coney Barrett: Part 2 | Change My Mind
description: Steven Crowder takes to a college campus to have real conversations with real people. In this second installment, Steven discusses why Supreme Court nominee Amy Coney Barrett should be confirmed before the 2020 election and also takes on the topic of packing the courts
itunes:author: Blaze Podcast Network
